name: Space Oddities
description:
For restart game - reload page)) 

You are diving deeper and deeper into deep space in search of a new home. 

Watch the amount of food and the operation of the engines. 

Your current count of food and distance to target is dispaying in left corner.

More engines is working - you have faster speed.

Clone your minions in cloning machine to use them to produce resources.

Food generator converts 1 minion to 50 food. 

Fuel generator converts 1 minion to fuel bag and you need move it to engine.


You win, if you reach destination and have one or more minions. 

Controls

WSAD - move camera

Q-E - zoom camera

mouse left - click on minions for select and click on place for choose target for active minion.

Gameplay video
Attention:

Balance doesn't exist)) Pay attention for generation property on minions - it's have effect to cloning. Any cloning have corruption of gens.
